description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Ashraf XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder: from n/a through 1.3.

product.name: XLTab – Accordions and Tabs for Elementor Page Builder
